name: The best killer I know
description:
Day one, you lost everything in a gamble, and now you're lost, luckily a stranger comes to the rescue and knows a place where you can sleep.

This is the first game I've ever made and i don't know how this is going to unpack. I really hope you like it <3.

Please check out the maker of the character(s): @go_cooking_go on twitter <3
